ns:common.document.text: QASL (Quality Assurance Scripting Language) is a scripting language that allows developers and quality assurance personnel to create functional tests for web applications. QASL runs these web application tests and generates an XML-based report. QASL can be integrated with continuous integration environment such as Cruise Control.\nThe QASL interpreter is implemented in C# but can be used to test web applications written in any language.\nQASL is available under the Open Source Apache 2.0 license.
